accelerometer_publisher.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 from robotic_skin.sensor.lsm6ds3_accel import LSM6DS3_acclerometer
2 from sensor_msgs.msg import Imu
3 import rospy
4 import rospkg
5 import argparse
6 
7 if __name__ == "__main__":
8  parser = argparse.ArgumentParser()
9  parser.add_argument('--config_file', action="store",
10  dest="config_file", required=True,
11  help="The configuration yaml file name in package's config folder")
12  args = parser.parse_args()
13  ros_robotic_skin_path = rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
14  config_file = ros_robotic_skin_path + "/config/" + args.config_file
15  accel = LSM6DS3_acclerometer(config_file)
16  rospy.init_node('talker_%s' % str(accel.config_dict['imu_number']), anonymous=True)
17  pub = rospy.Publisher('/imu_data%s' % str(accel.config_dict['imu_number']), Imu, queue_size=10)
18  r = rospy.Rate(100)
19  imu_msg = Imu()
20  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
21  data0_list = accel.read()
22  imu_msg.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
23  imu_msg.linear_acceleration.x = data0_list[0]
24  imu_msg.linear_acceleration.y = data0_list[1]
25  imu_msg.linear_acceleration.z = data0_list[2]
26  pub.publish(imu_msg)
27  r.sleep()
